summary: The team addressed the issue with deleting Sprint 3 via API, which failed due to unsupported functionality, and decided to reset all stories to the backlog for a clean start with a new Sprint 1 (SP-001). Mike proposed prioritizing user stories like login flow (US-010) or employee management (US-015, US-001) and requested client input to select 2-5 stories for a quick testable build.

decisions.title: Proceed with new Sprint 1 (SP-001)
decisions.details: Treat the situation as a clean slate after resetting stories to the backlog; old sprint records can remain harmlessly or be manually wiped if admin access is available.

actions.task: Provide thoughts on priorities for Sprint 1, such as login flow (US-010) or employee management (US-015, US-001)
Analyze the backlog and propose a group of 2-5 user stories based on client priorities for a testable build in ~20 minutes

backlog_deltas.title: Reset all stories back to the Backlog, removing sprint assignments

risks.risk: Old sprint records may persist in the system if not manually deleted
risks.mitigation: Records are harmless and can be ignored, or manually wiped using admin access if available
